content.question: Let <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be a differentiable function such that <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, g of x, times e raised to the fraction x over 4 power, d x, equals, 4 times, g of x, times e raised to the fraction x over 4 power, minus, the indefinite integral of, 8 times x squared, times e raised to the fraction x over 4 power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="g of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="two thirds times x cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="eight thirds times x cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="two thirds times x cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.11: (BC ONLY) Integrating Using Integration by Parts

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
